recommendations: Always use fictional addresses in demo/test environments
Include [FICTIF] or [DEMO] markers in property descriptions
Add clear disclaimers in user interfaces
Use obviously fake city names like 'DemoVille' or 'TestCity'
Never reference real properties without proper legal authorization
